name: Cygnus
description:
Cygnus is a 2D action platformer made for a Spring 2018 Capstone project at CSU: Monterey Bay.

After crash landing on a planet and having the pieces of your ship scatter across the various regions, you need to utilize an artifact that allows you to control the elements and get the parts back.  Each hand can absorb an element, so they can be mixed and matched to defeat the enemy robots that inhabit that planet or solve puzzles.  e.g. fire + water => steam propulsion.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD / Space
  • Interact: E
  • Requires a mouse (uses middle click, sorry trackpads!)

As this was a student project / proof of concept, there are still a number of bugs.  The game is feature complete though and is ~2 hours of gameplay (or 30 minutes if you know what you're doing!)
